info.name: Asoud API Document
info.description:
# 🚀 Versions

v1.8:

- payment added with zarinpal demo
    
- wallet functionality added
    
- orders and cart are now available plus notifications for order creation and verifications
    

v1.7:

- advertisements added
    
- affiliate added
    
- subdomains for advertisments and visit card added
    
- product list api slightly changed
    

v 1.6

- price inquiry images
    
    - inquiry image upload now accept multiple images. also images for answer are added.
        

v1.5

- subdomains added
    
    - mobile applications can use 'app' subdomain to access market, product and later advertise detail. these links will be used for sharing info across users.
        
    - each market now has it's own subdomain that is their 'business_id' . also their products are accessible under /products subcategory and also can access product details by /products/{{product_id}}.
        

v1.4.1

- price inquiry answer is only accepted from owners:
    
    - owner are users that have at least one market
        

v1.4

- price inquiry app ready:
    
    - users can create and update inquiries, list them, get their details; and also get the answers for each inquiry.
        
    - owners can see all inquiries and answer the ones they want to.
        
    - notification system is created for both users and owners using websocket. the urls are sent in asoud websocket collection.
        

v1.3

- reservation app urls for update and delete changed :
    
    - primary key comes before the action (update / delete) name
        

v1.2

- sms app is almost ready: most urls and request/response bodies will remain the same but there are still configurations remaining and may change the interface of some sms creating apis.
    
- reservation app ready to use: all apis up to this moment are okay and both user and owner have their apis. there is only payment left to be completed that will not affect other apis.
    
- product api updated: product create request body updated. also product discount create api is added.
    

v1.1

- Discount app is ready : discount for both market and product can be applied. authorization steps are done so each market owner can only change or update his/her own discounts. also the validation of tokens from user side requeirs the market or product detail so that a discount code from another market/product is not used.

item.name: Update a Theme with product_theme_id in url And A List Of product_id In Request Body

body.raw:
{
    "market": "{{marketID}}",
    "type": "good", // "good" or "service"
    "name": "Test name 1004",
    "description": "Test description",
    "technical_details": "Test technial details",
    "sub_category": "{{subcategoryID}}",
    "keywords": ["Test","keywords"],
    "stock": 100,
    "price": 10000,
    "main_price": 10000,
    "colleague_price": 9000, // optional 
    "marketer_price": 8000, // optional
    "maximum_sell_price": 8500, // optional
    "status": "published",                      // options: draft, queue, not_published, published, needs_editing, inactive
    "required_product": "",    // optional
    "gift_product": "",        // optional
    "is_marketer": true,
    "is_requirement": false, // default = false
    "tag": "new",                           // options: new, special_offer, coming_soon, none
    "tag_position": "top_left",             // options: top_left, top_right, bottom_left, bottom_right
    "sell_type": "online",                  // options: online, person, both
    "ship_cost": 20000,
    "ship_cost_pay_type": "market"          // options: market, customer, free
}

response.name: Success

body.raw:
{
    "market": "{{marketID}}",
    "name": "Test name",
    "description": "Test description",
    "technical_details": "Test technial details",
    "keywords": "Test,keywords",            // comma seperated
    "stock": 100,
    "price": 10000,
    "status": "draft",                      // options: draft, queue, not_published, published, needs_editing, inactive
    "required_product": "{{productID}}",    // optional
    "gift_product": "{{productID}}",        // optional
    "is_marketer": false,
    "marketer_price": 9000,
    "tag": "new",                           // options: new, special_offer, coming_soon, none
    "tag_position": "top_left",             // options: top_left, top_right, bottom_left, bottom_right
    "sell_type": "online",                  // options: online, person, both
    "ship_cost": 20000,
    "ship_cost_pay_type": "market",         // options: market, customer, free
    "theme": "{{themeID}}"
}

item.description:
please note that in "List Comments" the content-type can be 'market' or 'product' , as for now only these two models are ready for commenting.

when 'market' is used the next section of the url should use 'marketID' instead of 'productID'
